overview:
Launched in July 2012, LinkTub is looking to bridge the gap between the social web and search engine technology, optimization, and marketing. Publishers submit their domains in order to sell relevant text based ads. Advertisers can then quickly search related domains based on our keyword matching technology.

Through APIs Linktub creates a value based market from SEO and Social Media metrics derived from the Publisher base. If you have any questions, or would just like to join for Free; go to LinkTub.com
